```{r config, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
library(jsonlite)
library(evoteams)
library(crotchet)

opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  fig.path = "figs/",
  fig.width = 6,
  fig.height = 3,
  cache.path = ".cache/"
)

read_graphviz_chunk("team-structures", "evoteams")
```
